view_strings.welcome_text:
Welcome to SalaryAdministrationGui -personnel management application!
The employees can be created, modified and deleted in the editor on the left side. The created employees will appear on the right side as a list where you may use the following the following actions:
Single click -> Select Employee Double click -> Loads Employee on the left form for editing
The application will automatically save and load the employee data displayed on the application window.
For examples, try selecting File->Load from application menu.
